con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="UserWebService" targetNamespace="http://miniservice.examples.springside.org" xmlns:ns1="http://cxf.apache.org/bindings/xformat" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://miniservice.examples.springside.org" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://miniservice.examples.springside.org" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="authUser" type="tns:authUser"/> <xs:element name="authUserResponse" type="tns:authUserResponse"/> <xs:element name="createUser" type="tns:createUser"/> <xs:element name="createUserResponse" type="tns:createUserResponse"/> <xs:element name="getAllUser" type="tns:getAllUser"/> <xs:element name="getAllUserResponse" type="tns:getAllUserResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="authUser"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="loginName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="password" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="authUserResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:WSResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="WSResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="getAllUser"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="getAllUserResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:GetAllUserResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="GetAllUserResult"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:WSResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="userList" nillable="true" type="tns:User"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="User"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="email" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="loginName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roles" nillable="true" type="tns:Role"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Role"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createUser"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="user" type="tns:User"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createUserResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="return" type="tns:CreateUserResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CreateUserResult"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:WSResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="userId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="createUser"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createUser" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authUser"> <wsdl:part element="tns:authUser" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAllUser"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getAllUser" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createUserResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createUserResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getAllUserResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:getAllUserResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="authUserResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:authUserResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="UserService"> <wsdl:operation name="authUser"> <wsdl:input message="tns:authUser" name="authUser"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:authUserResponse" name="authUserResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getAllUser"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getAllUser" name="getAllUser"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:getAllUserResponse" name="getAllUserResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createUser"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createUser" name="createUser"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:createUserResponse" name="createUserResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="UserWebServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:UserService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="authUser"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="authUser"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="authUserResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="getAllUser"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="getAllUser"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="getAllUserResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="createUser"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="createUser"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="createUserResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="UserWebService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:UserWebServiceSoapBinding" name="UserWebServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/mini-service/services/UserService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
